Install

pip install flexidispatch

How to use

Fill me in please! Don't forget code examples:

{% raw %} 
process = Multimethod("processing payload", lambda x: x["framework"])

@process.add("polaris")
def f(x):
    return "I am polaris"

@process.add("vega")
def f(x):
    return "I am vega"
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
process({
    "framework":"polaris",
    "scores":{"P":1,"O":1}
})

'I am polaris'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
process({
    "framework":"vega",
    "x":[1,2],
    "scores":{"V":1,"E":1}
})

'I am vega'
{% endraw %}
